title: EMS System Engineer
description:
Role:
EMS Systems Engineer
Location: Austin, Texas
Salary: $120,000-150,000 + Annual Bonus
Industry: Utilities
Hours: Monday - Friday 8-5 (Hybrid)
RELOCATION ASSISTANCE provided.
The EMS Linux Systems Engineer maintains and supports Energy Management Systems and related applications. They provide technical analysis to ensure reliable Transmission Operations, adhering to NERC standards and ERCOT protocols.
Responsibilities
Manages EMS Linux servers, applications, and tools
Performs system mainten
requirements: bachelor’s degree in engineering or related technical discipline.

experience in
energy or utility sector
system administration expertise in linux operating systems
competitive_advantages: Proven infrastructure reliability experience (99.8% uptime track record)
Memory Platform project demonstrates end-to-end AI system development
Documented systematic learning approach and skill development methodology
Perfect timing for Infrastructure professionals entering AI field due to system integration needs
application_strategy: Research and networking approach: Company culture alignment but significant skill gaps. Focus on networking and learning about role requirements.
follow_up_strategy: Standard follow-up strategy: Professional follow-up after 1 week, highlighting key qualifications.
